mapper.select: SELECT G.PRGRM_CD, G.GC_OG_NM, G.USER_NO, G.NOPE, DATE_FORMAT(G.SCHDL_BGNG_YMD, '%Y-%m-%d %H시') AS SCHDL_BGNG_YMD, DATE_FORMAT(G.SCHDL_END_YMD, '%Y-%m-%d %H시') AS SCHDL_END_YMD, DATE_FORMAT(G.GC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H시') AS GC_DT, G.PRGRM_NM, G.PRGRM_TYPE, G.GC_CONTS_CN, G.GC_DTL_CN, COALESCE(APPLY_CNT.COUNT, 0) AS APPLY_CNT FROM GC_PROGRAM G LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRGRM_CD, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PRGRM_APP GROUP BY PRGRM_CD ) APPLY_CNT ON G.PRGRM_CD = APPLY_CNT.PRGRM_CD;
